product_name: Blue Orange Spot It Jr.! Animals Card Game
long_description: With six adorable animals on each card, the Blue Orange Spot it Jr.! Animals card game is an ideal matching activity for kids under 7 years old, but you can play it at any age. Little ones will love matching over 30 colorful animals and making all their sounds. Spot it Jr.! Animals is a fun way to sharpen kids' cognitive speed, visual perception skills, focus and reaction time; the variety of images will challenge all ages. Includes 31 cards and illustrated rules.
short_description: With six adorable animals on each card, the Blue Orange Spot it Jr.! Animals card game is an ideal matching activity for kids under 7 years old, but you can play it at any age.
